FUSO INSULAR

O mundo de Janiele
Caetano Dias
27 August
at 22:00
Location

Castelo de São Jorge

Curator Ana Rito
Session Magical World

On a sunny afternoon a little girl is playing with a hula hoop on a slab, in a suburban neighborhood, while the world revolves around her. The girl, with dark skin and red hair, is at the heart of her own universe, as a solar element in the orbit drawn by the hula hoop, underlined by the circular motion of the camera. This continuous line drawn by the circling hula hoop denounces an interior construct, like a thread of life that she tries to keep in orbit.

Direction: Caetano Dias
Cinematography: Marcelo Pinheiro
Participation: Janiele Cerqueira
Assistant Director: Alex Souzan
Production: Fabíola Aquino e Marta Luna
Cast: Silverino Ojú
Direct sound and sound mixing: Marcelo Pinheiro
Grip: Natan Cerqueira
Driver: Bago
Equipment: Jorge Mello (JM)
Acknowledgment: APUS FILMES
Filmed at Dom Avelar neighborhood, Salvador-BA

Acknowledge: Berardo Collection – Museu Coleção Berardo
